ModMetaData.name: Fortification Industrial - Citadel
ModMetaData.author: AobaKuma
ModMetaData.description: we made our colony a Fortress,a casket made by concrete we put our cannons into casket made by concrete, and we aim safely form inside. we lure the enemy into casket made by concrete, welcoming them with gunfire. we live in the casket made by concrete ,protect us form the threat outside Our burial are those Mechanoid , Insectoid and of course, those social parasite after we died , we will live in the casket made by concrete.
